alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 2:33PM PST until December 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to four tenths of an inch possible mainly north of Mt Jefferson. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
